Reviews.Content: many issues fellow reviewers hotel least circumstances completely rooms clean tidy spacious modern service knowledgeable polite breakfast catered tastes location superb slight street noise experienced small price pay right heart barcelona looking 5 never going find within hotel never offer 3 rating would suggest would recommend hotel anyone looking short comfortable affordable break wonderful city
Reviews.Author: alearezzo

Reviews.Content: reviews say except christmas time wonderful look window onto lights street 5 minute walk action suffer badly exchange problems euro excellent choice acceptable hotel reasonable rate advantage huge range food outlets area cheap cheerful expensive hop hop bus stops within 1 minutes walk
Reviews.Author: windsor

Reviews.Content: agree pretty much recent reviews spent 2 nights atlantis early november business trip also stayed years previously reason positives location – minutes placa catalunya transport connections including bus trips airport 45 euros way price – hard find anything decent central barcelona price go often business probably best option want convenient position cleanliness – 100 ok air con – necessary room even november beds – found really comfortable maybe bit soft people great us negatives rooms – mostly choice noisy room window view quiet room due 1 window opening onto ie square shaft running ground floor 5th it’s sealed fresh air get also unlucky enough get noisy couple whose waking hours like window open feeling wanting get room woman surrounded red blood odd supposedly placed opposite bed 2 nights still really wanted wake breakfast – area mediocre food pretty well looked staff american breakfast fine assured really cost much supply real orange juice country fruits coffee noticed several couples starbucks takeaway cups tables walk away said much worse barcelona hotels around price one far atlantis found tables coffee milk dirty never end breakfast period nothing early morning watch group tourists served boiled eggs noone else allowed one however hard atlantis gives decent value great position probably use
Reviews.Author: jennyhoya

Reviews.Content: liked hotel location room good size decent breakfast
Reviews.Author: HelenDavis84

Reviews.Content: great choice hotel close everything 130 per night rooms large clean well decorated modern bathroom great hot breakfast lots choices included staff spoke english helpful example one suggestions hop hop bus left main square two blocks away great choice since one day see city cruise left would stay sure
Reviews.Author: jamitch

Reviews.Content: great location close plaza catalunya ramblas
Reviews.Author: Jaybeesys

Reviews.Content: best thing hotel location followed cleanliness polite helpful staff easy access metro system walking distance city centre sights well las ramblas therefore close restaurants bars ideal city break decent breakfast found lot restaurants quite expensive especially bottle wine lucky enough one called food superb despite slightly cheaper others wine restaurants eg paid eur bottle wine restaurants find turn right hotel right first side street come left bottom short street two good local long dont mind surrounded students
Reviews.Author: SF-Traveler01

Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights atlantis happy room clean beds comfortable location wonderful close las ramblas public transportation onoff bus blocks away easy walk sagrada familia museum hotels expensive delighted discover atlantis e per night breakfast taxes included best dining experience excellent food beautiful presentation attentive service best experience la fun fun place
Reviews.Author: travelinjack3

Reviews.Content: got great rate hotel perfect location top ramblas didnt expect great pleasantly surprised noise room window facing center opening could see peoples windows across opening problem kept curtains shut far elevator completely quiet noise clean smallish bathroom good shower front desk helpful needed free wifi also use 1 computer near front desk must stand use computer tends limit peoples time didnt usually wait breakfast slightly average fresh fruit several choices soft sliced cheese ham boiled eggs several breads cereals fruit juice toaster quite good selection short block ramblas top easy walk ramblas passeig gracia near favorite ice cream cute de liked hotel location cleanliness quiet room noise issue ask room around solarium dont know call space 4 rooms face toward empty space
Reviews.Author: lolaborro

Reviews.Content: returned 2 night stay hotel atlantis following 5 night cruise little nervous read werent good however found hotel ideally located top las ramblas rooms clean spacious fresh towels daily great facilities bar closed dont know made welcome neighbouring hotel 3 year old son us found hotel perfect overlooking courtyard noise highly recommend hotel booked try lovely hotel next door
Reviews.Author: kaypagoldcoast

Reviews.Content: sister stayed atlantis 3 6 june 2008 great time hotel ideally situated placa de catalunya catch aerobus airport las ramblas long street many shops restaurants also close attractions room nicely decorated rather spacious downside overlooking carrer de busy street volume noise terrible moreover windows old closing properly difficult sleep somehow managed tired walking around town day breakfast quite good wide selection food good experience would recommend advise request room overlooking courtyard book want good night sleep
Reviews.Author: TIME80

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights atlantis february overall everything great junior suite floor 3 spacious clean modern great bathroom comfortable beds great choice breakfast staff friendly helpful breakfast room clean bright hotels location perfect 3 minutes walk top las ramblas good range shops bars restaurants nearby however problems noise noisy american occupied room next door 2nd night woke us returned drunk started screaming shouting 3rd night someone held rave party nearby apartment kept awake 2 hours hotel concierge apologetic could help visit hotel might worth checking problem regular earplugs recommended
Reviews.Author: Irish_Traveller085

Reviews.Content: stayed barcelona knew location read reviews went ahead booked turned great move hotel square top las ramblas convenient local etc one night fri 5 oct pre cruise stay checkin breeze room small adequate 2 people looked like recently renovated bathroom fittings looked new overall would go back
Reviews.Author: visitor69

Reviews.Content: hotel savoy savoy hotel good expensive hotel closed main station minutes walk city main station 2 walk city centre 10 minutes walk main river 3 minutes walk double room big clean big wonderful breakfast paid 80 euro staff kind savoy spa swimming pool good roof swimming pool see good
Reviews.Author: MGPC

Reviews.Content: wouldnt come back one night frankfurt chose hotel convenient train station flight next morning first problem finding hotel train station center door train station looked street must seen dozen hotels savoy thought read trip advisor post turn left station turned wrong direction tried asking help train station one heard savoy could even tell us street located since turning left hadnt hotel turned around walked direction finally find street hotel located visible front train station gotten train turned right train station end case hotel would visible double room fine triple room unpleasant something stained walls third bed couch made told would done returned dinner still blankets pillow couch returned hours later given single room additional charge might fine traveller needs close proximity train station found nothing otherwise certainly wouldnt want walk around streets night
Reviews.Author: traveller1079

Reviews.Content: great location good value close train station easy walk sites nice rooftop pool clean bathroom
Reviews.Author: mobius20

Reviews.Content: great location hotel could better stayed savoy june hotel great location 2 minutes walk train station easy stroll sites reception looked nice staff good however disappointed room firstly interior quite shabby shower leaked bathroom move rooms second day tap broke bathroom tap could fixed new room slightly better still would call 4 star hotel still wasnt bad money paid get hotel cheap price fine dont pay lot
Reviews.Author: superkittie

Reviews.Content: disappointed stayed hotel 2 nights disappointed room view triple room son slept sofa bed hotels stayed triple booked three beds rather think double sofa barely room walk around room lift also small booked hotel location across road railway station price reasonable traveling train mornings convenient us full breakfast good receptionists helpful able get around city easily probably look staying elsewhere went back frankfurt
Reviews.Author: Babybug

Reviews.Content: great value location savoy located virtually across road main train station takes 3 minutes walk entrance station across road tour getting city tours breeze convenient walk shopping areas also close red light district looking people street around corner hotel hotel room comfortable include airconditioning euro 5 extra per day well worth breakfast euro 15 per day enough make cheese day would stay staff helpful bar open evening
Reviews.Author: TiredHamilton

Reviews.Content: excellent hotel ive stayed savoy couple times flights frankfurt airport never problem location excellent right across main train station frankfurt within walking distance downtown area historical pedestrian rooms clean beds comfortable front desk staff friendly whats also nice shutters outside windows completely keep light room though room window facing front hotel youre bound hear bit street noise typical european meats cheeses breads yogurt fruit also small bar drink though plenty nice spots area grab drink cant say anything negative place continue book anytime im frankfurt
Reviews.Author: tarrkan82

Reviews.Content: fan since limited ac location cannot beat convenience thing high priced hot box going online site made mention hotel ac couple floors hot night frankfurt location great easy access train station via underground good cheap shopping underground area train station hotel bar priced even beer usually cheap everywhere germany staff friendly helpful want nonsmoking room request without money
Reviews.Author: TravelBug55

Reviews.Content: fair choice get decent rate im giving hotel 3 rating price paid left last minute must sort going frankfurt hotels fully booked ones asking extortionate prices chose savoy proximity station unlike station hotels didnt find area particularly rough went dinner evening young female alone didnt feel unsafe must also mention many restaurants near hotel room pretty average paid euros think worth 120 maximum breakfast selection good problem tables taken staff didnt seem keen help ended leaving plate breakfast would recommend hotel get less 150 euro id go somewhere else
Reviews.Author: ThetravellerKerry

Reviews.Content: savoy certainly us travelled europe originally chose savoy close main railway station read reviews say breakfast excellent staying 3 4 5 star hotels throughout europe middle east period 3 months say best breakfast experienced definitely absolute delight big question definitely staying savoy whenever travel frankfurt
Reviews.Author: VerheijJ

Reviews.Content: lovely hotel thats amazing hotel outside terrible looks ugly inside amazing huge clean hall staff speaking perfect english rooms big bed large confortable top floor theres swimming pool beautiful steam bath lovely sauna would loved spend stay hotel breakfast incredible theres vast selection food german british breakfast tastes really good price absolutely cheap offers make sure book trade fair period prices incredibly pay personally customer mine paid id recommend easy access main train station bus stop buses
Reviews.Author: Maruru

Reviews.Content: bad booked hotel night whilst attending trade fair right beside main train station 10 15 minutes taxi airport hotel nicely decorated relaxing reception area comfortable bar three lifts building booked superior room paying little extra got room comparable standard 3 star hotel ireland im standard room pretty hotel acceptable would stay
Reviews.Author: dublinrose

Reviews.Content: great value clean stayed one night late location 2 minutes train station still quiet enough get good nights rooms although wifi didnt work properly hotel wifi general area
Reviews.Author: Tarheel006

Reviews.Content: excellent value money husband come back hotel savoy frankfurt october 2007 say pleasantly impressed hotel located opposite frankfurt central station convenient hotel reception friendly speaks good english except porter bit looking given room located first floor clean built next lift shaft noisy lift room accommodating twin room two beds shaped room one beds unable see person tv etc fine us shower toilet facilities fine side tea making facilities rooms ie kettle breakfast buffet really good lots choice choose breakfast like scrambled fried eggs bacon sausage meats big selection cereals breads rolls cheese yogurts chocolate croissants toast fresh fruits waitress attentive always quick offer coffee tea basket full fruits free pastries reception lobby throughout day also served us free drink bar waiting room ready could check us found hotel excellent value money would stay would demand different room location definitely would 710 highly recommended
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: ok pool hotel located opposite central station handy background noise didnt find good nearby near number seedy shops hotel reasonable though price paid rooms good size comfortable breakfast buffet really good lots choice fruit cake reception throughout day reception staff really helpful able answer questions small swimming pool sauna steam room top hotel overlooks bright lights frankfurt skyline perfect raining outside
Reviews.Author: julia687

Reviews.Content: best value entire trip im generally picky comes hotels long clean safe im usually happy savoy however made final night germany left completely arrived frankfurt dropped savoy based short review travel book stayed single room least paid room entire stay savoy far away better room though small cares fantastic large bed modern bathroom safe fridge exceptionally clean felt like first person stay front desk staff spoke perfect english hotel wireless internet slightly expensive additional fee fast included breakfast amazing even room breakfast wouldve made wished left time enjoy needed get airport
Reviews.Author: Mr. Scottie

Reviews.Content: great hotel great hotel would go back breakfast went hotel 4 stars 3 stars main reception outstanding decor well worthy 4 stars breakfast room although rooms lacking 4 stars department old fridge falling bits general except bathroom upgraded make near 4 star room overall found hotel excellent value money breakfast room everything would want breakfast basic toast full get go back many times want staff friendly always help hotel directly outside main train station town
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: hotel much better hotels better deals dont stay problems hidden charges combined rude front desk think get good deal find charge things never air example know hotels charge local calls many dont call went inroom hotel information outside line place calls list charges fees calls shocked upon checkout found huge bill local phone calls made wouldnt known would charge asked explanation see hotel fees writing rude recieved germany america dont fees pay call felt people services charging fees attitude ok 4 star far airconditioning choose heat opening windows everyone mosquitos fly feast rooms small cramped showers dont even full shower curtain bathroom soaked shower
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: air conditioning noisy arrived hotel allocated room busy roads tram track requesting quiet room thinking requirements requested another room unfortunately got different floor room air conditioning like sauna window opened noise excessive eventually sleeping tiled bathroom floor cool place stay want quiet cool room
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: savoy stayed savoy april 28 30 two nights single comfort room found everything good standard room rather small bed big comfortable everything new clean working properly perfect even high temperatures outside room quiet even though opposite elevators breakfast extremely good overall good 4 star booked directly hotel website paid eur per night included
Reviews.Author: plattfuss

Reviews.Content: christmas markets frankfurt savoy boyfriend arranged 5 day break see christmas 2006 markets booked flights got onto searching internet hotels frankfurt first brought back quite pricey hotels found savoy hotel hotel booked later carried hotel hotel reviews savoy decided go open arrived surprised nice reception area reception staff spoke good english got 5th floor room must recently renovated doors still old couldnt believe bathroom brand new sign really old cracked sink bath deep explained reviews admit hotel worth 4 stars pleasantly good clean central city right beside train station breakfast great plenty choose cooked breakfast fruit yogurts cereal top floor small pool great view especially night time city lights lit steam room sauna gym great time christmas markets sight seeing bus tour booking office right opposite hotel really handy first time visitors city please dont put bad reviews certainly pleasant stay savoy
Reviews.Author: lass=

Reviews.Content: please take away stars arrived savoy hotel open mind reading reviews website wasnt quite sure expect central doubt check average reception area nice corridors bedrooms need paint carpet quiet worn bedrooms v small handle missing wardrobe door bathroom sliding one looks v strange kind reminded mobile sink bath v worn yellow looking bath quite high almost jump hate see elderly person would situation got bath literally tall shower attached therefore water everywhere unless hold hand bathroom experience partner discovered bed actually two single ones pushed together looking mattresses ever seen much made way reception enquired possibility changing rooms met cool forced smile told rooms night traffic room hot window left open worst though visible nearly called mattress worst nights sleep way breakfast made way reception asked manager duty say v nice efficient hearing story informed problem changing us newly renovated room 7th floor explained going major renovations moment pity girl checked us didnt inform us new room much pleasant new modern gotten room first night would really enjoyed stay breakfast room excellent nice work 4 star hotel really feel hotel savoy nowhere near required standards ireland going stay dont go high expectations fussy going bit shopping stay means ask room 7th floor
Reviews.Author: lass=

Reviews.Content: worst hotel ever stayed family went frankfurt last year christmas markets thought wed found bargain getting cheap rooms thought ill admit upon entry hotel impressed marble floors christmas reception area actually looked somewhat nice happily got key rooms got elevator go floor nightmare door lift opened hallway smell stains walls practically way room narrow got room blood sheets bed bottle complimentary water someone already drank glass toilet missing seat mention disgusting amount hairs sink door room would lock properly sort going 1am tired pulled sheets bed slept towels placed dirty mattress say slept mean closed eyes minutes time could allow sleep place filthy say booked next day due 2 days screaming match manager got refund night want remember stay frankfurt nice one please avoid hotel like staff rude rooms absolute may well money drain see hotel could even call 12 star let alone 4 star
Reviews.Author: meerx901

Reviews.Content: breakfast ok im skip room review go straight breakfast awesome spending first week trip eating yogurt breakfast every morning welcome change breakfast buffet included price offered scrambled fried eggs bacon sausage regular chocolate croissants fresh fruits cereals rolls meats cheeses yogurt wait staff attentive always quick offer coffee tea juice room also disappoint triple room three beds room large european standards offered amenities airconditioning tv bathroom bit small step get tub wasnt much head room hotels location excellent across street main train station could cut plaza street preferred 15 minute walk river front also restaurants bars shops surrounding area
Reviews.Author: lass=

Reviews.Content: great hotel 4 come back hotel savoy say surprised reviews read led believe going found hotel quite charming although 4 star rating bit 3 star would wise cant ask better hotel right across road central station within walking distance huge choice bars restuarants travelled child triple room fairly good size rooms bit run though carpet worn places walls could paint bathroom perfect bath really deep though watch young kids breakfast hotel cant dinner breakfast amazing choice foods suit every even fussy 8 year old staff excellent really helpful great information price paid really happy looking 4 luxury forget

Reviews.Content: great hotel cant understand reviews thought savoy fantastic got great rate hotel directly lovely little lounge breakfast delicious first hot cold food seen breakfast since arrived 10 days earlier free lobby free drink bar within walking distance museums main staff pleasant helpful id definitely stay could used another pillow bed though
